mbti.INTJ: You are a person who excels at envisioning a long-term future based on outstanding strategic thinking. You possess the insight to grasp complex problems at a glance and have a strong will to complete goals through your own firm logic and systematic planning. With a strong independent streak, you prefer to judge and decide for yourself, and you also have a perfectionist side that constantly seeks knowledge and aims to improve efficiency. While you may seem cold-headed, you are a reliable supporter who shares deep trust and wisdom with those you hold dear.
mbti.INTP: You are someone who truly enjoys deep contemplation and exploring logic and concepts. Your curiosity about the principles of the world and new ideas is so immense that once you encounter a field of interest, your concentration to dig into its essence is remarkable. Your strength lies in finding original solutions through critical and creative thinking rather than conventional methods. Though you may appear quiet and shy at times, you are a charming explorer who knows how to express your logical views with sparkling eyes when faced with intellectual conversations or interesting topics.
mbti.ENTJ: You are a natural leader with firm decisiveness and drive. Based on your insight into the future, you are highly skilled at setting clear goals, organizing efficiently, and producing the best results. Even when difficult obstacles appear, you gain energy from establishing strategies to overcome them rather than giving up. You possess the charisma to encourage and lead those around you to realize your vision. While you may seem strict at times, you are actually a passionate leader who sincerely desires and takes responsibility for the growth and success of your team.
mbti.ENTP: You are a creative individual with a wealth of ideas and a flexible way of thinking. You derive great energy from discovering and expanding new possibilities, and you excel at proposing ingenious alternatives by analyzing complex problems from various perspectives. With strong intellectual curiosity, you constantly acquire new knowledge and enjoy challenging stereotypes to create change. You have a talent for leading conversations and brightening the atmosphere with your unique wit and sense of humor, and you stand out for your agility in handling any situation flexibly without panic.
mbti.INFJ: You are a delicate person who possesses both deep insight and warm empathy. You strive to understand the inner lives of others and the meaning of life, and you exert a positive influence on your surroundings based on your quiet but firm convictions. You have a strong will to follow a path consistent with your values, and you feel a great sense of fulfillment in sincerely empathizing with and helping others in pain. While you appear soft and gentle on the outside, you harbor intense passion and high moral standards within, making you an idealist who silently works to make the world a better place.
mbti.INFP: You are a sincere idealist who values your own values and beliefs above all else. Based on a rich imagination and deep sensitivity, you cultivate your inner world beautifully and always seek truthful and meaningful choices. With deep understanding and an open attitude toward others, you provide comfort and solace to those around you and value harmony over conflict. Though you may appear quiet and introverted, you are a 'strong on the inside, soft on the outside' type with a warm heart who shows great courage when defending the values you believe in.
mbti.ENFJ: You are a warm supporter who feels true fulfillment and joy in helping and leading the growth of others. You have an excellent eye for recognizing people's potential, and you provide positive motivation to those around you based on your considerate leadership and outstanding communication skills. Valuing the harmony and happiness of the community, you exhibit a self-sacrificing and dedicated side to care for others, earning the trust of many with your unique charisma and kindness. You are a blessing-like presence who brightens the lives of those around you through sincere empathy and encouragement.
mbti.ENFP: You are a person who joyfully expands the countless possibilities of life with an enthusiastic and positive attitude. You truly enjoy connecting people and ideas, and you have a talent for instantly brightening the atmosphere with your characteristically active and vibrant energy. Possessing a free spirit, you prefer new changes and challenges over repetitive routines and exhibit immense immersion and creativity in tasks you find valuable. You are skilled at winning people's hearts with your rich sensitivity and empathy, a wonderful enthusiast who knows how to enjoy life like a festival.
mbti.ISTJ: You are a reliable realist who silently fulfills your role based on a strong sense of responsibility and sincerity. You respect established principles and order and possess a thoroughness that ensures the tasks you undertake are handled perfectly until the end. You are skilled at making realistic judgments based on facts and data and find comfort in firmly protecting the stability and order of life. Although you may not stand out flashily, you are the most dependable and consistent person who serves as the pillar of our society and organizations behind the scenes.
mbti.ISFJ: You are a warm person who meticulously looks after the needs of those around you with a detailed and dedicated attitude. You respect the emotions of others, provide quiet support, and impress others with your sincere dedication to your position, even when unnoticed. With a very strong sense of responsibility and a good memory, you have the kindness to remember and take care of even the small details about your loved ones. You excel at avoiding conflict and maintaining peaceful relationships, a kind guardian who is essential to the world and finds great happiness when your actions positively help those around you.
mbti.ESTJ: You are a competent executor who values system and order, managing affairs efficiently. Based on a clear sense of reality and fair judgment, you perform the role of an excellent manager, helping the organization move toward its goals. You solve problems through practical and logical thinking and possess outstanding drive to push through planned tasks to completion. You value rules and etiquette, demonstrating trustworthy behavior, and you are a reliable leader dedicated to the growth of your community with a strong attachment and sense of responsibility toward the groups you belong to.
mbti.ESFJ: You are a warm and sociable person who values harmony and cooperation with people above all else. You have an excellent ability to quickly grasp the moods and situations of those around you to maintain smooth relationships, and you do not hesitate to show kind and meticulous consideration. You feel great joy in helping others and actively participate in community events or social gatherings, playing the role of connecting people. Loved by those around you for your characteristic bright and friendly personality, you are a kind person who constantly strives to create a happy and harmonious environment for everyone.
mbti.ISTP: You are a practical and independent person who is skilled at directly solving immediate problems. Although you tend to be reticent, you have an outstanding ability to coolly observe and analyze situations, moving nimbly when necessary to produce results efficiently. You often have a talent for handling tools and technology and possess the boldness to remain calm even in complex situations. Valuing your privacy and freedom, you are a quiet but strong troubleshooter who paves your own way in life rather than depending on others.
mbti.ISFP: You are a warm person with an artist-like disposition, gentle and sensory. You express the beauty and value of life in your own unique way and possess the leisure to appreciate the present moment. With deep consideration for others and a dislike for conflict, you harmonize well with your surroundings and respect others as they are rather than forcing your values upon them. While you may seem quiet on the outside, deep and rich emotions and aesthetic senses flow within you, making you a charming person who fills life beautifully at your own pace.
mbti.ESTP: You are a dynamic person noted for quick situational judgment and bold action. You have an excellent ability to nimbly capture and act upon opportunities before you, and you are more practical and efficient than anyone else in solving realistic problems. Thanks to your active and adventure-loving nature, you adapt quickly to new environments and delight those around you with your characteristic confidence and wit. Preferring learning through direct experience over complex theories, you are an action-oriented person who spreads positive energy to those around you with your vibrant presence.
mbti.ESFP: You are a mood-maker who provides infinite joy to your surroundings with your bright and sociable personality. You value and enjoy the present moment more than anyone else and give joy and laughter to people with your characteristic vibrant energy and friendliness. With good observational skills, you quickly notice changes in others' moods and stand out for your sense in providing warm comfort or shifting the atmosphere. Truly liking new experiences and meeting new people, you are a lovely person who views the world brightly and positively with an optimistic and open mindset.

I.description: You recharge your energy through time alone and have a tendency to focus deeply on your inner world. You feel most comfortable when listening to your own thoughts, feelings, and ideas rather than external stimuli; you prefer listening to talking and value deep relationships with a select few. You stand out for your prudence in sufficiently contemplating and organizing internally before making decisions or expressing opinions. This is not simply being shy, but rather possessing the wisdom to understand the world and manage energy through your internal resources.

E.description: You are an active person who gains life vitality through interactions with people and various external activities. You enjoy meeting new people or being in unfamiliar situations, and you experience your thoughts becoming clearer and energy surging when sharing ideas and talking with others rather than being alone. You prefer learning through the process of taking action first and experiencing things directly, and you have an outstanding ability to brighten the surrounding atmosphere by projecting your energy outward. You feel great happiness in maintaining a wide range of interpersonal relationships and actively communicating with the world.

S.description: You focus on concrete and realistic information verified directly through your five senses, valuing the 'here and now' experience most. You possess a practical attitude, judging based on visible facts, data, and proven past experiences rather than abstract theories. Your strength lies in your meticulousness in not missing details, and you prefer systematic methods of following procedures step-by-step when performing a task. With an excellent sense of reality, you are very skilled at solving immediate problems and are a reliable realist who derives great satisfaction from producing practical and concrete results.

N.description: You are an insightful person inspired by patterns, possibilities, and future-oriented ideas beyond visible facts. Rather than getting buried in details, you strive to first grasp the overall flow and context, constantly exploring new approaches by asking 'what is possible.' With a rich imagination and intuition, you enjoy using metaphorical expressions and fully exercise your creativity in environments with change and innovation rather than repetitive routines. You pursue future visions and meaning over immediate reality and show an excellent ability to find solutions by interpreting complex problems from an original perspective.

T.description: You are a person who values making fair judgments based on logic and objective criteria. When facing a situation, you try to find the most efficient and rational solution by analyzing cause-and-effect relationships rather than leaning toward personal feelings or relationships. You value upholding truth and principles and possess an excellent ability to clarify situations by expressing opinions honestly, sometimes to the point of being felt as blunt. You prefer exchanging feedback based on facts rather than emotions and have an intellectual disposition that confirms your competence in the process of deriving the best results through objective analysis.

F.description: You are a warm person who carefully considers the feelings and values of others, placing harmony and bonds between people at the center of your judgment. Rather than logical right or wrong, you first worry about 'how this decision will affect people' and strive to choose directions where everyone can be happy through empathy and understanding appropriate to the situation. Valuing your own values and human relationships, you exhibit an excellent ability to mediate conflicts and create a cooperative atmosphere. You think based on deep affection and interest in people and have a gentle disposition with the power to move hearts through sincere encouragement and support.

J.description: You are a person who strives to structure life and maintain it in a predictable state through planned and systematic methods. You prefer setting schedules and priorities in advance to achieve goals and feel a sense of stability and efficiency in the process of strictly observing deadlines and making decisions quickly. You exercise your abilities to the fullest when there is an organized environment and clear guidelines, and you possess a strong sense of responsibility that feels at ease only after finishing what you have started. Your steady appearance, establishing life's order through systematic preparation and thorough self-management to move toward goals without wavering, is impressive.

P.description: You are a person who enjoys life by naturally adapting to changes in situations with a flexible and open attitude. Rather than being tied to strict plans, you prefer acting according to the flow of the moment and new possibilities, valuing the process of keeping various options open and gaining experience. You have excellent reflexes, handling sudden changes or unexpected situations nimbly without panic, and you feel joy in exploring new information due to your high curiosity. You sometimes emit creative energy amidst the urgency right before a deadline and have a charming disposition that pioneers life freely and flexibly outside of fixed frames.

Low.label: Stable Type
Low.description: You are a person who finds peace of mind in familiar and proven environments rather than new experiences or sudden changes. Valuing daily routines, your strength lies in calmly exercising your capabilities within predictable situations. Thanks to your prudent and planned attitude, you rarely make impulsive mistakes and give a sense of deep trust to those around you with your consistent appearance. Occasionally stepping slightly outside your familiar boundaries to try something new could be a wonderful opportunity to make your world even broader and richer.

Medium.description: You are maintaining a wise balance between the joy of change and the comfort of stability. You have an excellent ability to adjust the rhythm of your life, enjoying new adventures depending on the situation while sticking to familiar ways when necessary. Since you are neither overly impulsive nor resistant to change, you can adapt flexibly to any environment and make rational choices. This balanced perspective serves as a solid foundation that helps you grow steadily without missing out on the small happiness of daily life.

Your harmonious character and mediation ability are precious forces that connect people and create a peaceful world amidst desolate interests.
star.scorpio: Scorpio is an attractive water sign with deep sensitivity and keen insight. Your concentration to pierce through the essence of things is very outstanding, and your desire for exploration and patience to find truths not revealed outwardly are immense. While extremely dedicated enough to give your everything to someone you trust, you possess a seriousness that shows a firm attitude toward betrayal or lies. Harboring strong vitality and healing power within a mysterious atmosphere, your power to rise again while transforming yourself even in difficult crisis situations is powerful. Your deep insight and unwavering convictions lead to fundamental changes in life and become a powerful energy that gives deep resonance to your surroundings.
star.sagittarius: Sagittarius is an optimistic fire sign dreaming of free adventure and vast expansion. Full of desire for new experiences and knowledge, you show an explorer-like aspect deeply attracted to travel, philosophy, or idealistic values. You enjoy expanding the horizons of your life with an honest and open attitude, disliking being restricted, and spread positive energy that doesn't lose hope in any situation to your surroundings. While your words can be direct, you are that much without back-talk and truthful, and you are skilled at presenting a vision toward a better future. Your free spirit and tireless curiosity become a bright lamp that shows those around you a new world and encourages them to challenge.
star.capricorn: Capricorn is a solid earth sign moving toward noble responsibility and grand achievement. Goal-oriented and with a very outstanding realistic sense, your strength is patience in establishing long-term plans and silently striving to realize them. Often showing an adult-like aspect from childhood, you have a serious disposition that proves your value with trust and clear results rather than emotional appeals. Your grit in firmly consolidating your place while respecting social order and tradition is great. Your unwavering diligence and solid desire for achievement become the most reliable guide to success and a solid shield for those around you in an unstable reality.
star.aquarius: Aquarius is a air sign valuing innovative thinking and independent personality. Possessing an original and free way of thinking that isn't tied to existing customs or frames, you are a wise person who simultaneously possesses individual independence and a humanitarian perspective. In human relationships, you maintain an appropriate distance and value fairness, but you harbor future-oriented ideas and ideals to make the world a better place. Though you may appear cold, you treat people without prejudice more than anyone and prioritize universal justice over group interests. Your progressive thoughts and unique personality become precious sparks of innovation that newly change a stale world and bring the future forward.
star.pisces: Pisces is an emotional water sign with rich imagination and deep empathy. You have a natural helper's energy that meticulously permeates the emotions of others to share pain and heal it. Valuing the world of the heart and artistic inspiration over realistic conditions, your intuition is outstanding, and your ability to feel and imagine invisible truths is top-notch. Possessing a tolerance broad enough to be vague in boundaries, you embrace conflicts with love and are the owner of a pure soul who finds romance and hope even in the hardships of life. Your warm sensitivity and infinite understanding become a blessing-like gift that moistens and heals the hearts of dry people in a desolate world.

갑목.label: Big Tree Type
갑목.description: Gap-mok is a type that possesses a dignified spirit and strong growth desire like a huge tree stretching straight toward the sky. Like the existence that announces the beginning of the Ten Celestial Stems, your drive is outstanding, and your pioneer spirit of pioneering your own path without yielding even in any difficulty stands out. Valuing principles and justice, you show the aspect of a responsible leader trying to protect those around you under your shade. While you may appear to lack flexibility due to your straight nature at times, you are a person who becomes a reliable support giving consistent trust to that extent.

을목.label: Grass and Flower Type
을목.description: Eul-mok is a flexible and tenacious life-force disposition like grass swaying in a soft breeze or a beautifully blossomed flower. While appearing fragile and soft on the outside, you possess strong resilience that rises again even if stepped on and outstanding adaptability to take root in any environment. Valuing harmony with others, your ability to communicate warmly with those around you with delicate senses and empathy is outstanding. Equipped with realistic survival instincts and a practical eye, you are an attractive person who wisely protects your place even in complex human relationships.

병화.label: Sun Type
병화.description: Byeong-hwa is an energetic, cool-headed, and extroverted disposition like the sun that shines fairly on the whole world. With an honest and refreshingly straightforward personality without hiding, you convey bright energy to those around you and exercise flashy leadership that captures the public's eye with unique charisma and outstanding expression. Possessing a passionate aspect that cannot stand injustice because of a strong sense of justice, you have the generosity to share your warmth unsparingly. However, you may get exhausted yourself if you burn too hot, so if you take the leisure to calm your inner self occasionally, you will become an even more shining existence.

정화.label: Candlelight Type
정화.description: Jeong-hwa possesses a meticulous and dedicated aspect like a subtle candle lighting up the darkness or a warm brazier fire. Valuing inner deep resonance and intuition over outward flashiness, your empathy to meticulously read and embrace the pain of others is very outstanding. Though appearing quiet, you show craftsmanship that creates precise results by exercising immense concentration on what you've targeted. Harboring sensitive sensitivity within a polite and kind character, your artistic sense is outstanding, and you are a person with a noble disposition who shines a warm light by sacrificing yourself for loved ones.

무토.label: Earth Type
무토.description: Mu-to is a person with heavy stability and tolerance like the broad earth or a high mountain that embraces and grows all things. Possessing a solid inner self that isn't shaken by most stimuli, the reliable sense of responsibility to keep trust once formed until the end is your greatest strength. Equipped with a broad caliber to silently listen to and accept many people's stories, there are many people who depend on you nearby, and you hold the center of life well with realistic and prudent judgment. Expression can be somewhat blunt, but behind it, you are like a reliable protector harboring unchanging consistent love and heavy sincerity.

기토.label: Field Type
기토.description: Gi-to is a practical, delicate, and tolerant disposition like a fertile field cultivated with care. Your ability to meticulously manage and solve realistic problems with a planned attitude is outstanding, and you perform the role of a supporter who quietly helps and supports the growth of those around you excellently. Rather than strongly asserting your own claims, you respond flexibly to situations and stand out for your wisdom in seeking internal substance and looking after your interests. While you sometimes pressure yourself due to a worry-prone and meticulous personality, you are a person of skill who cultivates your life and surroundings beautifully with a diligent and warm heart.

경금.label: Ore Type
경금.description: Gyeong-geum is a type with strong will and decisiveness like a newly dug solid ore or a sharp blade. Your ability to handle work driven by clear standards and logic with certain boundaries is very outstanding. You show a reliable appearance of solving problems by piercing through the core without panic when a crisis situation strikes. Valuing loyalty and faithfulness, your uprightness in not yielding to any pressure for the values you believe are right is attractive. It can feel cold because of direct expression, but you are actually a person harboring a purer sense of justice and truthful inner heart than anyone.

신금.label: Jewel Type
신금.description: Sin-geum is a person with delicate and sophisticated senses like a finely cut shining jewel or a sharp scalpel. Your analytical power and judgment are very keen, creating results close to perfection, and you pursue completeness in all areas of life with your own sophisticated standards and high aesthetic eye. While possessing a clean, neat, and polite attitude, you harbor very strong self-esteem and independence within. Proving your value through meticulousness that doesn't miss even small details, you are sensitive to that extent but possess the outstanding ability to find beauty and truth that others cannot see thanks to that.

임수.label: Big Sea Type
임수.description: Im-su is a refreshingly straightforward person with free and large-scale thinking like the broad sea that accepts all river waters. Wise and curious, you enjoy acquiring various knowledge and show outstanding adaptability and broad tolerance to respond flexibly to any situation. While you may appear peaceful on the outside, you harbor deep thoughts and infinite possibilities within, so once you set a direction, you emit immense energy and move toward the goal. While liking to hang out with people, you value your own deep inner world and are a dynamic disposition that constantly changes and grows like flowing water.

계수.label: Rain and Mist Type
계수.description: Gye-su symbolizes delicate and deep sensitivity like a sweet rain that revives all things or a mysterious mist. Behind a quiet and calm appearance, you possess sharp observational skills and insight, so your wisdom in accurately piercing through the other party's psychology or the essence of a situation stands out. You well-perform the role of connecting and healing people by softly permeating the surrounding environment and pioneer your own original path based on a rich imagination and creative inner world. You exercise a quiet influence not revealed outwardly and are an intellectual disposition who purifies the world with a clear and clean heart and seeks the deep meaning of life.

자.label: Rat
자.description: Ja (子) means the condensed life force of midwinter, and you are a person with agility who is very nimble, intelligent, and adapts quickly to any situation. Your observational skills to quietly grasp situations and capture opportunities where they aren't seen are very outstanding, and you possess the wisdom to reduce mistakes with meticulousness that doesn't miss detailed parts. Behind a sociable and charming facet, you combine realistic judgment, making your ability to cultivate your life practically outstanding. Your industriousness and cleverness are a solid foundation that always finds a breakthrough and makes life prosperous even in difficult environments.

축.label: Ox
축.description: Chuk (丑) is the energy preparing for spring in the cold earth, and you are a reliable person who moves toward goals with diligence, sincerity, and unchanging patience. You value responsibility above all else, and the sense of stability in realizing plans step-by-step without rushing is your greatest charm. You prefer a serious depth that focuses on internal substance over outward flashiness and have great grit to complete a task once started until the end. As a support-like presence giving deep relief to those around you while silently protecting your place, your sincerity will return as the valuable fruit of a grand achievement as time passes.

인.label: Tiger
인.description: In (寅) symbolizes the powerful energy of early spring when all things awaken, and you possess a wonderful leadership that leads people with a courageous spirit of challenge and strong drive. You have no fear in starting new work or pioneering unfamiliar paths, and the energy of revealing your presence with a dignified and independent appearance is very impressive. Simultaneously equipped with a sense of justice that cannot stand injustice and a warm heart to help others, you receive the respect of those around you. Your dynamic and progressive spirit becomes a powerful driving force that breathes vitality into stagnant atmospheres and changes the world.

묘.label: Rabbit
묘.description: Myo (卯) is a person who forms social relationships well by communicating harmoniously with surroundings with a soft and gentle character like a green sprout coming up. Delicate aesthetic sense and consideration for the hearts of others are rich, making your charm in conveying comfort and kindness to people outstanding. Having a strong tendency to avoid conflict and maintain peace, you excellently perform the role of a mediator in human relationships and receive the love of those around you with a polite and sophisticated attitude. You may appear fragile, but you have solidity protecting your own convictions within and are a wise person who solves complex problems softly with unique flexibility.

진.label: Dragon
진.description: Jin (辰) is a progressive person who enjoys new attempts based on creative energy and strong drive like a dragon soaring to the sky. Possessing the courage to enjoy challenges without losing your vision even in fast-changing environments, you provide positive inspiration and stimulus to those around you with a passionate and confident appearance. Often achieving exceptional accomplishments because you pursue large-scale and idealistic goals, your ability to lead the public with innate charisma stands out. Your spirit of constantly moving toward higher places rather than being satisfied with reality possesses a mysterious power that turns the impossible into the possible.

사.label: Snake
사.description: Sa (巳) is a person who closely analyzes situations based on a wise and keen intuition like the early summer sun that delivers light evenly to all things. Rather than flashily revealing yourself outwardly, you tend to move prudently while focusing on internal substance, and the clear and sharp judgment you show at important moments is your unique strength. Your insight into piercing the essence of things or people is outstanding, preventing mistakes in advance, and you also give off a sophisticated social manner and elegant atmosphere. Your quiet charisma and mysterious wisdom are excellent guides that coordinate situations behind the scenes and lead life safely.

오.label: Horse
오.description: O (午) is full of a free spirit and vibrant energy like the hot midsummer sun, making you a person who joyfully meets new experiences. Thanks to an optimistic and refreshingly straightforward personality, you are welcomed anywhere, and your ability to make the surrounding atmosphere bright and positive with rich sociability and a passionate attitude is outstanding. A dynamic life force is felt in how you run powerfully on your own path, disliking being restricted, and you gain the trust of people with an honest and no-back-talk character. Your tireless passion and activity are dazzling energy that breathes vitality into a stagnant world and lets you move forward quickly toward goals.

미.label: Sheep
미.description: Mi (未) is a warm person who values harmony with those around you with a gentle and considerate character, harboring the energy of the prosperous earth. A sincere kindness and tolerance are felt in the way you silently help others while prudently looking at the surrounding situation. Pursuing peace and stability, you softly reconcile places where there is conflict and possess a consistent heart that values a relationship once formed. You appear soft, but you also harbor strong will and stubbornness within to protect the values you believe are right until the end. Your thoughtful actions provide an emotional haven for people and cultivate life richly.

신.label: Monkey
신.description: Sin (申) means solid rock or the beginning of fruit, and you have top-notch ability to solve immediate problems wittily with a clever brain and flexible way of thinking. Versatile, you adapt quickly in any field and are skilled at finding new alternatives with a creative view that isn't tied to stereotypes. You convey joy to people with vibrant energy and a sense of humor and possess the leisure to turn even complex situations lightly and pleasantly. Your ability to nimbly capture situational changes and make them your opportunity is outstanding, and your cleverness and flexibility will make you a shining protagonist even in any crisis.

유.label: Rooster
유.description: Yu (酉) is a very diligent person equipped with meticulous and accurate work processing and realistic judgment, like a finely cut jewel or a well-honed blade. You possess a strong sense of responsibility to complete what you've planned without gaps, and your appearance of pursuing an organized environment and an ordered life gives deep trust to those around you. Equipped with righteousness to clearly distinguish the right and wrong of things with keen observational and analytical skills, you know how to protect your dignity with neat and clean manners. Your thorough self-management and precise work ability become the most essential driving force for creating high-completion results in any organization.

술.label: Dog
술.description: Sul (戌) is a guardian-like person who protects those around you with a loyal and reliable character like a solid castle wall guarding the earth. Your sense of responsibility is very strong, and your honest and dedicated appearance in keeping unchanging faith for relationships or organizations once formed is beautiful. Grasping situations objectively with an outstanding sense of reality, the courage you exercise to protect loved ones when danger strikes is great. You may appear somewhat blunt on the outside, but you harbor deeper affection and sincerity than anyone within. Your consistent loyalty and diligence are the most solid and precious foundation of trust among people.

해.label: Pig
해.description: Hae (亥) is a gentle person who harmonizes peacefully with those around you with a generous and broad heart like the wide sea where all things flow and embrace. You aim for a harmonious life based on deep trust and consideration for people and convey love and relief to those around you with an honest and unadorned personality. You appear easy-going and optimistic on the outside, but you harbor a strong will and clear opinion within, so you have the power to move forward silently in work you believe is right. Your broad tolerance and sincere attitude become a blessing that gathers people's hearts as one in a desolate world and makes life happy and prosperous.

Stability.label: Stability-Seeking Type
Stability.description: As a stability-seeker, you are a person who feels deep emotional security in predictable and organized environments. You value existing systems and methods that are already working well and feel a great sense of fulfillment in the process of achieving gradual improvements within them. Rather than the confusion caused by sudden changes, your capabilities shine most when you can adjust the pace of life yourself and maintain balance. This prudence and consistency serve as a solid root that firmly supports your life, becoming a very great power that presents unchanging trust and peace to those around you.

Change.label: Change-Seeking Type
Change.description: As a change-seeker, you are a dynamic person who takes new challenges and experiences as the greatest vitality of life. Rather than settling into familiarity, you feel truly alive when moving toward constant growth and new possibilities, and you have an outstanding ability to handle sudden environmental changes flexibly without panic. The learning and stimulation gained while pioneering unfamiliar paths make you a more creative person, and you possess a wonderful energy that discovers new opportunities others can't see, cultivating a prosperous and diverse life based on your unique adaptability.

Balanced.label: Stability-Change Balanced Type
Balanced.description: As someone with a stability-change balance, you are a wise person who deeply understands both the need for stability to protect the present and the value of change to open the future. You possess realistic insight to avoid reckless risks while making bold decisions at moments essential for growth. By flexibly adjusting your position according to the situation, you are very skilled at finding the best compromise between 'what must be kept' and 'what must be changed.' Thanks to this balanced perspective, you can steadily achieve sustainable growth without losing leisure even amidst tension.

Relationship.label: Relationship-Oriented Type
Relationship.description: As a relationship-oriented person, you are a kind individual who regards warm connections and harmonious coexistence with people as the highest values in life. You meticulously consider the impact and feelings your choices will have on those around you and discover true life satisfaction and happiness within the bonds of mutual help and trust. Your deep empathy, where the joy of others becomes your own, is your greatest charm, and this warm heart becomes an invisible string that always keeps good people around you. You are a blessing-like presence who practices the value of moving forward together, making your surroundings bright and warm.

Individual.label: Individual-Oriented Type
Individual.description: As an individual-oriented person, you feel the greatest conviction and comfort when making independent choices based on your own clear values and standards. Your appearance of moving with conviction in the direction you can be convinced of, rather than being swept away by the gaze of others or social expectations, is very impressive. You possess the strength to lead a self-reliant life by focusing on your inner self and firmly protect your sovereignty over life through the process of respecting and caring for yourself. This independent attitude makes your life clearer and more consistent, serving as a driving force to boldly pioneer your own original path.

Balanced.label: Relationship-Individual Balanced Type
Balanced.description: As someone with a relationship-individual balance, you well-understand the appropriate distance between protecting your autonomy and harmonizing smoothly with others. Your ability to communicate, cooperating and achieving harmony within relationships without losing yourself, is your very excellent strength. You wisely distinguish between when to exercise independent opinions and when to be considerate of surroundings depending on the situation, knowing how to maintain healthy boundaries. Thanks to this, you wisely adjust stress coming from interpersonal relationships while simultaneously enjoying deep bonds with people and personal achievements in a balanced life.

Achievement.label: Achievement-Oriented Type
Achievement.description: As an achievement-oriented person, you are someone who confirms your value and feels deep joy when setting clear goals and achieving them to get visible results. Based on high immersion and concentration, your drive to solve immediate tasks efficiently is outstanding, and your inner passion and energy come alive more as tasks become clearer. Your tireless desire for achievement becomes a powerful engine that constantly develops yourself and leads you to higher places. Your appearance of striving for the best results in your field serves as a wonderful example that gives trust and inspiration to many.

Balance.label: Balance-Oriented Type
Balance.description: As a balance-oriented person, you are a wise individual who prioritizes the harmony of life as a whole and inner peace, even though goal achievement is important. Rather than unreasonably whipping yourself to chase results, you value a sustainable rhythm of life where you can protect the health of body and mind for a long time. The wisdom to know when to stop and the leisure to enjoy small daily happinesses make your life even more prosperous. Thanks to this attitude, you do not easily get exhausted even in fierce competition and can draw a healthy and beautiful map of life while savoring it at your own pace.

Balanced.label: Achievement-Balance Orchestrating Type
Balanced.description: As an achievement-balance orchestrator, you are a person who can immerse yourself hotly toward goals while accurately recognizing and adjusting the limits you can handle. Your adjustment ability is very outstanding, exercising explosive concentration to create performance when needed and boldly stopping to recharge energy when rest is required. Your appearance of finding your own optimized rhythm while constantly communicating between the desire for achievement and quality of life is impressive. Thanks to this flexible coordination ability, you are a skilled person who realizes your dreams healthily in the long term without falling into burnout despite high performance.

Reality.label: Reality-Oriented Type
Reality.description: As a reality-oriented person, you possess a practical attitude that makes rational judgments based on realistic conditions and efficiency. Preferring choices followed by practical results over abstract slogans, you have a solid sense of reality for designing life on a sturdy and stable foundation. Because you find solutions based on objective data and facts for any problem, your decisions always gain high trust. This practical eye protects your life from unnecessary trial and error and serves as the most powerful and solid asset for 일구어내실질적인 prosperity and stability.

Meaning.label: Meaning-Seeking Type
Meaning.description: As a meaning-seeker, you are a person who deeply reflects on the fundamental value and meaning contained in a process as much as the result of a choice. Rather than simply chasing immediate profit or efficiency, you gain true motivation when you have conviction about 'why I must do this' and feel the greatest happiness when walking a path consistent with your inner beliefs. Your attitude of exploring the depth of life and trying to exert a good influence on the world gives resonance to those around you to look back on the essence of life. You are a wonderful idealist who completes life deeply and truthfully through choices your soul can be convinced of.

Balanced.label: Reality-Meaning Balanced Type
Balanced.description: As someone with a reality-meaning balance, you are a wise person who finds a harmonious contact point between realistic needs and inner values. While considering practical conditions for survival, your balanced life attitude of trying not to lose the meaning of life within them stands out. Because you know how to keep your convictions while compromising with reality, you make relatively harmonious and regret-free choices between money and value, or efficiency and satisfaction. Thanks to this virtue of the mean, your life shines in a prosperous way that is very stable yet doesn't miss deep inner fulfillment.
